@Koz763: don't know what Terasu meant by 'drastically'... but it may not be a bad thing.
See, the main problem the kid, in the series, has isn't the Chad at all - that guy is just doing what he thinks he can get away with, and, evidently, that's a lot. No, his real, big problem is the women in his life: backstabbing, faithless, two-faced sluts that would definitely have him killed if that mean they could get some BBC. So 'drastically' could mean that, after he find out about their betrayal, he cut them out of his life, and start over again as a new, improved and way less gullible man, while the tramps he left behind are now back where they belong: to the street. Now... will that actually happen? Fuck no. C'mon now - this is a Terasu MC story. Might as well expect a BTB - dream on! But you never know - maybe the author will finally show some mercy to the poor kid... don't hold you breath on that one, though.
